issue.title: [Rust] IPC Support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5180](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5180). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The overall ticket to keep track of initial IPC support

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5180?focusedCommentId=16954650) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
We need some integration support to complete this

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5180?focusedCommentId=17023921) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
The initial work on Rust IPC support is now complete 🎉🥳

Wider dictionary support and integration testing are the next steps `[~andygrove]` `[~paddyhoran]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5180?focusedCommentId=17023946) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Congratulations [~nevi_me] and thanks for all the hard work on this!

I am working on building a flight server with DataFusion over at <https://github.com/andygrove/datafusion-flight-poc/tree/master/rust> but would be happy to move this into the arrow repo as an example if that makes sense.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5180?focusedCommentId=17025499) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Seems like it could be a good idea if only to keep the Arrow-Rust community "hacking together" so to speak
